Ok, SoulStice, that's it. One more false accusation, and you're GONE. 
Got that? Now, I took the time out of my lunch half-hour to search 
through the posts and get KSL's last three that had firing. Please 
review:


Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer/Dark One:


Scattershot watches as a few autoguns open fire on Sharpedge and 
Jeststorm, 
Scattershot descending a missile blast sending him plumetting into 
the ground.

---

Nemesis Enforcer blocked the blasts with his wings, which were badly 
damaged. 
 He fired off twenty-five rapid blasts at Jestorm, and 10 rapid optic 
blasts 
off at Jeststorm.

---

Dark One, now turned around, fired off two missiles at Sharpedge.



- Now, that's 25 rapid fire and 10 optics, and then two missiles. 
Anything wrong with that?



Dark One/Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer:



Dark One barrel rolls, his wings getting clipped, though he still wa 
sin the 
air.  He awaited the chance to fire again as he started to turn 
around.

---

Scattershot sidestepped in the air again, barely dodging the 
missiles, the 
explosions sending him flying backwards.

---

Nemesis Enforcer flew up, a few blasts hitting his legs and feet.  He 
fired 
off twenty-five rapid laser blasts from his rifle at Jestorm, 
followed by 
twelve rapid optic blasts at Jestorm's sternum.



- 25 rapid fire lasers and 12 rapid fire optic blasts.



Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Dark One/Shockwave:


Nemesis Enforcer blocks with his wings, but is sent flying back, 
slamming to 
the ground,  firing 10 rapid optic blasts at Jetstorm's abdomen.

---

Scattershot yelled as the missiles came, twirling through the air 
letting 
them pass, keeping a cool composure on the outside, the inside he was 
getting 
beat.  The shockwave of the missiles had almost made him lose his 
balance in 
the air and crash.

But he was able to stay up.  Reaching into subspace, he pulled out 
two 
grenades, one for each hand.  He dropped both grenades down at 
Sharpedge, 
both explosives set to go off on impact.

---

Dark One got a target lock on Diskus, but saw that Nemesis Enforcer 
was 
nearly beaten in his current situation.  Jetstorm (Dark One doesn't 
know who 
he is though) looked like a formidable opponent though.  Changing his 
course, 
he fired twenty-five rapid laser blasts off at Jestorm's back.

The black jet fighter continued with on course, his missile launchers 
arming.

------

Shockwave stepped out of the forest, looking at the battle and 
carnage.  Even 
if he could've smiled, he wouldn't have.  His white right hand 
transformed 
into a long barrel.  The 'Decepticon' looked around for a target, 
Alliance or 
otherwise.


- 10 rapid optic blasts, 2 grenades, 25 rapid laser shots.


Also, if you'd notice, Unitron takes falling as an action. So unlike 
you or me, when one of his bots falls, or even turns, he waits for 
the next post to say it. Example:

---

Scattershot sidestepped in the air again, barely dodging the 
missiles, the 
explosions sending him flying backwards.

---

If that was my char, Scattershot would have jumped up, or regained 
balance and returned fire. But he didn't. I copy-pasted these emails 
in a hurry (I'm running out of time), but if you can find ANY others 
that break the rule, forward away.

One more false accusation though, and I'm either going to moderate or 
remove you. I'm getting sick of this. People have to learn to take 
defeat without whining.


P.S. If you can't find any moding emails from Unitron, you will 
appologize to him.

~~~~~~~~~~
